functionfinder.ffrunner¶

Main program.

This script contains the main part of the programm which orchestrates calculations and can be called, after installation, by the CLI-command ff.

Methods¶

task()

Run the calculations to solve the given task.

Functions

task()

Run the calculations to solve the given task.
